resources.string: text2: This is some other text, with a link specified via an <a> tag. Use a \"tel:\" URL to dial a phone number.

This very useful app is Developed by Lazy Juan.

Want to stay in contact with me? Send me a hate mail by clicking Mail me button below.

 Credits to:

IconDrawer - for the cake image that serves also as the app icon.

Visual Pham - for the smiley icon.
Sorry. Today is not your Birthday. Try again tomorrow.
